original_title: The Enduring Mystery of Jack the Ripper
overview: In the late 19th century, a notorious serial killer known as Jack the Ripper preyed on destitute women in the East End of London. Despite an extensive manhunt and a few close calls, the Ripper was never caught. Instead, the murders came to an abrupt end and left behind one of the greatest mysteries in the annals of crime.
tagline: A Haunting and Unresolved Chapter in the History of Crime
title: The Enduring Mystery of Jack the Ripper
